links.*: The Book of Lost Tales Part Two

wikitext.*:
'''Evranin''' was an [[Elves|Elf]] of [[Artanor]], and the nurse of [[Elwing]], according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] in ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''. She helped Elwing escape the [[Second Kinslaying|ruin of Artanor]] by the [[sons of Fëanor]].

She, along with [[Gereth]], a [[Gnomes|Gnome]], also managed to smuggle the [[Nauglafring]] out of Artanor.<ref>{{LT2|IV}}, p. 241</ref>
